Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Drexel, 47th, Lake Park and 51st, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Drexel, 47th, Lake Park and 51st, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: SB 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
